html:
• Marisa Banigan
  • November 24, 2021

It's now even easier for AWS customers to research, procure, and deploy Apptio's IT and cloud financial management solutions.

Last year, we added Apptio Cost Transparency to AWS Marketplace, a global digital catalog of software, data, and services. AWS Marketplace makes it easy for end users to find, test, buy, and deploy software and data products that run on AWS.

We are excited to announce that we've expanded our AWS Marketplace catalog further to include four additional IT and cloud financial management solutions.

By visiting the AWS and Apptio partner page, you can dive into the Apptio portfolio to learn firsthand how Apptio helps organizations across the globe drive change within their organizations, accelerate decision-making, and empower IT and finance teams to work better together. The expansion of Apptio offerings available on AWS Marketplace gives users a convenient way to search and procure technology solutions. Users can also leverage AWS credits for purchases and consolidate billing into a singular touchpoint.

Learn more about the newly added Apptio solutions in AWS Marketplace:

  • ApptioOne combines financial and operational data into a unified model built on an industry-standard taxonomy of cost categorization. ApptioOne enables organizations to answer strategic questions about investments and accelerates budgeting and forecasting processes.
  • ApptioOne Plus streamlines applications and operations to promote a collaborative approach to investments and deepen business unit partnerships.
  • Cloudability SaaS helps organizations understand, manage, optimize, and govern SaaS portfolios, enabling teams to make data-driven investment decisions about SaaS solutions.
  • Cloudability Shift helps users create defensible migration plans, comparing public cloud options to determine the ideal target end state and support faster migrations.

View all of the available Apptio offerings in AWS Marketplace by visiting the Apptio profile on AWS Marketplace. To learn more about these Apptio solutions, join us at AWS re:Invent (booth 869), where Apptio is a Platinum Sponsor. Apptio will host a breakout session on "Developing Your FinOps Practice to Make the Most of Your AWS Cloud Spend" December 1 at 5:30 p.m. PST.
